TextView.android:text:
1.First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win.
2.Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
3.Your tomorrow depends entirely on what you do today.
4.God has no religion.
5.Those who say religion has nothing to do with politics do not know what religion is.
6.Nothing is impossible for pure love.
7.One should not think of embracing another religion before one had fully understand his own.
8.Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent than the one derived from fear of punishment.
